data.name: Consumer Friendly
data.info: Let the non-technical user easily find answers with intuitive UI.

data.name: Specialized
data.info: The goal isn't to create a multi-purpose search, but a targeted set of filters for a specific purpose.

data.name: Smart Build System
data.info: Build system ignores `spec` files, allowing you to keep tests alongside code. Automatic injection of scripts and styles into your index.html

data.name: Modular Structure
data.info: Best practice client and server structures allow for more code reusability and maximum scalability

data.name: Optimized Build
data.info: Build process packs up your templates as a single JavaScript payload, minifies your scripts/css/images, and rewrites asset names for caching.

data.name: Deployment Ready
data.info: Easily deploy your app to Heroku or Openshift with the heroku and openshift subgenerators
